original_title: Against the Grain - The Sapperton Group of Craftsmen Designers
overview: The aspirations and achievements of the English furniture designers and craftsmen, Ernest Gimson (1863-1919), Ernest Barnsley (1863-1926), and Sidney Barnsley (1865-1926), who settled in the Cotswolds and devoted themselves to the development of traditional crafts.
title: Against the Grain - The Sapperton Group of Craftsmen Designers
